flavor.reason: The flavor of the dishes received mixed reviews, with some items praised for their taste while others were criticized for blandness and inconsistency.

freshness.reason: The ingredients were generally fresh and appreciated, though there were occasional issues with cold food and one report of undercooked seafood.

service.reason: Service was a major concern, with reports of rude staff, long wait times, and delivery problems.

environment.reason: The ambiance was well-received, described as vibrant and welcoming, though some minor amenities were lacking.

value.reason: Opinions on value were divided, with some finding the pricing fair for the portions and others feeling it was high given the inconsistencies.
